narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Behavior Interventions, INC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in King of Prussia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $73.8M in Medicaid payments across 385K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $73.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
